documentation.text: Document Key shadow retrieval service contract.

documentation.text: / Only pass when caller is the owner of given public key.
When document key common-portion retrieval request is received.
When document key personal-portion retrieval request is received.

When document key common portion is retrieved. Ater this event s fired, wait for
 exactly `threshold+1` `DocumentKeyPersonalRetrieved` events with the same `decryptedSecret` value.

When document key personal portion is retrieved. After enough events are fired, use `secretstore_shadowDecrypt`
 to decrypt document contents.
When error occurs during document key retrieval.
Constructor.
We do not support direct payments.
Request document key retrieval.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
